Articles.Content:
I was thinking, if Squad is gonna implement new special Kerbals (like Linus, Walt, Mortimer, etc.), a good idea would be to use a female Kerbal for the actual planetary science when/if discovering planetary bodies and their properties becomes a part of the game.

I recommend Carolyn Kerman, inspired by Carolyn Porco.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carolyn_Porco](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carolyn_Porco)
